name: Make him scream
description:
In this game, YOU are a monster that wants to become an "official monster". To do this, you need to take an exam which consists in making a man the most afraid as possible ("Make him scream !"). 
To do that you can interact with some objects of the house. 

-- Conception Notes -- 

I had to finish this game really quiclky, because of that he is really short. There is no real "story" and some sounds and animations are missing... And I had no time for the Jam :) 

Have fun and thanks for playing !
